mean_cn: n. 证书，证明，认证，鉴定
mean_en: the act of certifying something; the process of giving certificates for a course of education.
word_etyma: cert证明 + ifi + cation名词后缀 → certification 证书
sentence: All of the pork on sale here has the certification to prove it's quality-assured.
sentence_trans: 这里出售的所有猪肉均有证书证明他们在质量上有保障。
